item.title: Week 01-1: Math 1A Review
item.description: Key Concepts from Chapter 5 Section 5.1 Area Under a Curve The area \(a\) of the region \(S\) that lies under the graph of the continuous function \(f\) is \begin{align} A &= \lim_{n \to \inf} [ f(x_1)\Delta x + f(x_2)\Delta x + \ldots + f(x_n)\Delta x ] \\ &= \lim_{n \to \inf} \Delta x \sum_{i=1}^{n} f(x_i) \end{align} Distance Traveled \begin{align} d = \lim_{n \to \inf} \sum_{i=1}^{n} \Delta t f(t_i) \end{align} Section 5.
